name: getrandomquote
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool random_chunk_api.
Tool description: A simple random picker for names, movies, TV shows, quotes, and numbers. A simple JSON object, user object, and array generator.
API description: Fetches a random quote from the specified category using the provided API key.

category.description: The category of the quote to fetch. Defaults to 'life'.

count.description: The number of quotes to fetch. Defaults to 1.
